    reads the variable controls configuration and dataset to create a recipe, which may include tuning dials

    create_recipe.Rd

    reads the variable controls configuration and dataset to create a recipe, which may include tuning dials

    create_recipe(
  data_to_use = data1,
  vc = var_controls,
  mc = transform_controls,
  wc = workflow_controls
)

    Arguments

    data_to_use

    defaults to data1, should be a tibble or tidytable that has variable names and structure useable as template for the MMM data

    vc

    defaults to var_controls, should be a tibble describing individual variable roles (ie role and role 2 and varname are included inthe tibble).

    mc

    defaults to transform_controls; a tibble with hyperparameter ranges by role (ie media type)

    wc

    defaults to workflow_controls; a tibble with R_name and Value columns where R_name holds control names expected by several of this package's functions and Value is the value of those controls

    Value

    a recipe with roles, adstock and saturation steps defined by controls table

    Contents

    Developed by Lorenzen Ted.
